channel.title: TravelgateX Documentation ‚Äì graphql-changelog
channel.description: Recent changes in graphql-changelog on TravelgateX Documentation

item.title: Hotel-X: GraphQL Schema Changes
item.description: The GraphQL HotelX schema change log is a list of recent and upcoming changes to our GraphQL API schema. It includes backwards-compatible changes, schema previews, and upcoming breaking changes. Check out this list of new releases and changes applied on the HotelX GraphQL API.

item.title: Travelgatex: GraphQL Schema Changes
item.description:
The GraphQL schema change log is a list of recent and upcoming changes to our GraphQL API schema. It includes backwards-compatible changes, schema previews, and upcoming breaking changes. Check out this list of new releases and changes applied on the TravelgateX GraphQL API. 2021-02-09 üõë Field suitFolder was removed from object type AdminMutation üõë Enum value FOLDER_DEFAULT was removed from enum FolderTemplate üõë Type SuitFolderInput was removed ‚ö†Ô∏è Enum value FOLDER_BUYER was added to enum FolderTemplate
[...]
